author: sky.cactus
content: You could add an origin to all devp2p messages.

author: sky.cactus
content:
> Would that be needed? Unless they explicitly mod the client, the client identifies itself in the p2p handshake
This only tells you info about who the last hop was, not who the origin was.

author: sky.cactus
content: The problem with origin info is that anyone wanting to remain anonymous is incentivized to set their origin to the most popular origin so they minimize leaked information about themselves.
